title: 5. Leilung pian hmain thu chu a awm
lyrics:
Doh is D
Leilung pian hmain thu chu a awm,
Pa Pathian nen chatuanin an inzawm;
Engkim a zain aman a siam,
A siam loh a awm lo, khawvelan.

Chu chanchinah chuan hei kan lawm,
Thu chu tisaa changin a awm;
A ropui zia hmutuin a ziak.
Khawngaih leh thutakin a lo khat.

Thil dang a ni lo Thu kan tih hi,
Krista, Lal Isua ngei kha a lo ni;
Mi rilru thuin a chhuak angi,
Pathian rilru a lang, Kristain.

Pathian, zawlneiin thu a hril chawk,
Angel-te pawhin an inhriattir bawk;
A tirh hnunhnun ber i lawm ang u,
Pathian mihring, a Fapa ngei chu.
